|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = ADMtek;ADM6996L; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:0C:E5 |oui = 00:0C:E5 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = none |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 3 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = motorola |defaultssid = motorola XXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTB-108GM |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT,OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/30/2004 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://broadband.motorola.com/consumers/products/WR850g/downloads/wr850g_userguide_6.1.4.pdf User guide] OEM Gemtek WRTB-108GM (WRTB-108GM_V01) P/N: 518576-001-00 The default SSID is '''motorola XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits of the WLAN MAC address (upper case letters). The included power adapter is a '''Leader Electronics''' P/N 503913-004, Model MT20-21120-A00F (12V, 750mA). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. {{WiFiCert|W002472|08/06/2004}} :There is an additional certification of W002797 (09/23/2004) for this device. It notes no change in capabilities aside from Enterprise WPA support (no WPA2 support noted). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Flash_Your_Motorola_WR850G WR850G on the DD-WRT wiki]
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Motorola/WR850G WR850G on the OpenWrt wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24 build 5538 20070109 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Motorola_WR850G Install Guide] On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Motorola/WR850G |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
